column1: #text=Yesterday , I decided to bake a cake for my friend 's birthday .
#text=First , I preheated my oven to 350 degrees .
#text=I then took a square cake pan out of my cabinet and rubbed butter all over the pan .
#text=I sprinkled flour in the pan so that the cake would not stick to it .
#text=I then took a chocolate cake mix that I purchased yesterday at the grocery store out of my food pantry .
#text=I opened the cake mix and poured it into a large bowl .
#text=I measured one cup of water in a measuring cup and poured the water into the bowl with the cake mix .
#text=I then measured one-third cups of vegetable oil and also poured the oil into the cake mix bowl .
#text=I went to my refrigerator and got three eggs out of the carton .
#text=I cracked all three eggs , one at a time , into the bowl .
#text=I turned on my mixer and mixed the cake mix , water , vegetable oil , and eggs all together in the bowl for about three minutes .
#text=When all the ingredients were fully mixed together and formed a batter , I poured the batter into the square cake pan .
#text=Since I had already preheated the oven , I put the pan into the oven .
#text=I let the cake cook for about twenty minutes until it was done .
#text=I took the cake out of the oven and let it cool .
#text=After about thirty minutes , I opened a can of vanilla frosting and spread the frosting across the top of the cake .
#text=Finally , I placed some birthday candles on the cake to celebrate my friend 's birthday .
#text=Today , we ate the cake and it was delicious !
